line_1: They sordidly the generous Art decry,
line_2: And from Tub Pulpits knock down Poetry.

line_1: Attentive truth and nature to decry,
line_2: And pierce each scene with philosophic eye.

line_1: And with dam'd Female spite decry,
line_2: One that knew all as oft as I,

line_1: Then prompt no more the follies you decry,
line_2: As tyrants doom their tools of guilt to die;
